A. R. NESTOSS
Deputy Superintendent
Administration
Department
of
Public Instruction
M. F. PETERSON, Superintendent
BISMARCK, NORTH DAKOTA
May 8, 1961
RICHARD K. KLEIN
Assistant Superintendent
Instruction
GENERAL GEORGE CUSTER
"TRAIL WEST"
MANDAN
Mr. William G Harley
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
Washington, D.C.
Dear Mr. Harley:
I have your wire stating that "Harris still has no reply
your Governor re letter March 28 asking indication of
interest in using Federal Funds for ETV if legislation is
enacted."
I suggest that you contact the Governor of North Dakota,
William L. Guy, directly.
Yours sincerely,
DEPARTMENT OF
